feed.title: SAP Community - PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance
feed.subtitle: PLM EAM/Plant Maintenance Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Perform Installation and dismantling of technical object through service notification or order
entry.content:
We have a requirement currently for our user to perform the installation and dismantling of serializes equipment with reference to service order or NOtification created so they have a history of the equipment usage maintained. Currently we are unable to have any linkage between the service notification and dismantling in fiori. 

We tried using manage structure option in Find technical object but it still does not provide any option to  link the action to the service notification or order

REgards,

Pooja Bhagat

entry.title: SAP PM – Single Cycle Plan Behavior with Late Completion & Shift Factors
entry.content:
Hi experts,
I need guidance on setting up a single cycle maintenance plan in SAP with the following parameters:

  • Start Date: 01.01.2020
  • Cycle Frequency: 1 year
  • Shift Factor: 100%
  • Tolerance: 0%
  • Completion Required: Checked
  • Call Horizon: Not maintained

Scenario:
The first order was generated on 01.01.2021 but could not be completed on time. It was finally completed on 02.12.2025.

Questions:

  1. When will the next order be called and what will be its planned date?

    • Will it be delayed by 4 years (due to late completion)?
    • Or will it still be generated as per the original schedule on 01.01.2026?

  2. Is it possible to configure the plan so that the next work order is called 1 year from the actual completion date of the previous order (i.e., 02.12.2025), rather than sticking to the original schedule?

Any insights or best practices would be greatly appreciated!

entry.title: Call object (maintenance order) not generated after call date passing in the maintenance plan
entry.content:
Hi,

Facing an below issue and expecting your suggestions to solve this issue.

A time-based single cycle maintenance plan (6 Month cycle) was configured with: No strategy, No offset, Shift Factor Early = 0%, Shift Factor Late = 0%, Tolerance = 0%, Completion requirement not tick. offset 0 month. 

Five calls have already been completed from 2023 to 2025, with all calls completed earlier than their scheduled dates by 6–14 days.

The 6th call (due 16.12.2025) has gone into Schedule HOLD, resulting in the error:

IP435 – No maintenance call object exists for planned date.

Call Days Early

114 days early
210 days early
36 days early
49 days early
57 days early

entry.title: Need to use manage workforce in Private Cloude - how to
entry.content:
Hi there!

I'm an asset management consultant and want to use the personal number in the maintenance orders. In the Public Cloud is the app Manage Workforce to creat an employee. But in the privtat cloud, there I don't find this app.

How can I create an employee in the private cloud?

SAP recomends not to use the miniHR anymore....

Anybody who can help?

Thx in advance,

Thomas

entry.title: Month wise depreciation with Net book value and Remaining use ful life
entry.content:
I have asset RS. 100000

Depreciation should be calculated with netbook value and remaining useful life 4 years for each month seprately. Normally i saw system calculate depreciation year wise and then divide it 12.

I want to calculate as follow:

1st month: 100000 / (12 x 4 = 48 month) = 2083.33

2nd Month: NBV (100000-2083.33) = 97916.66 / (47 month) = 2083.33

3rd month: NBV (97916.66 - 2083.33) = 95833.33 / (46 Month) = 2083.33

4th Month: NBV (95833.33 - 2083.33) = 93749.97 / (45 Month) = 2083.33

 

So my requirement is that for each month, system should calculate not only netbook value but also remaining month wise, not year wise.

Thanks

entry.title: Fiori app - F2173 - Find Maintenance Order and Operation
entry.content:
Hi, 

We are using S4 Hana Private Cloud -2023 FPS version . Users have assigned multiple Maint . Order operations to himself using perform maintenance jobs app  .Now, there is a requirement that we need to unassign him & assign to some other personnel no using  Find Maintenance Order and Operation in mass . We can accomplish this one by one with this app . As there are hundreds of operation , how can we achieve this at one go . Please note that we are not using Resource Scheduling Tool . 

Thanking you in advance for your support .

Best Regards 

Mohammed

entry.title: CBM Scheduled
entry.content: I have 3 Pumps as A, B and C . A is running continuously whereas B and C  having changeover plan of 3months, now i wan to schedule plan for CBM for Pump B and C with weekly monitoring without affecting compliance Part

entry.title: Como solucionar No task List Selected IW322
entry.content:
Generando un nuevo plan de mantenimiento y una nueva task list, se realizo un nuevo llamado en ip10, al momento de querer convertir de  CRTD A REL aparece el siguiente error IW322 No task List selected, las fechas coinciden y esta en progreso la lista de taras, la anterior ya con delet Flag pero continua el error, ¿Como se puede solucionar?

After generating a new maintenance plan and a new task list, a new call was made on ip10. When attempting to convert from CRTD to REL, the following error appeared: IW322 No task list selected. The dates match and the task list is in progress. The previous one already has a delete flag, but the error persists. How can this be resolved?

entry.title: Managing Vehicles in SAP Asset Management and SAP SSAM
entry.content:
Dear Colleagues,

I am currently working on a requirement related to vehicle management within SAP S/4HANA Asset Management and SAP Service and Asset Manager (SSAM).

Could you please advise if there are any standard capabilities available for managing vehicles that can be leveraged by technicians in both SAP Asset Management and SSAM?

Regarding SSAM specifically, I reviewed the Features and Personas Configuration Matrix but could not find any relevant features : https://help.sap.com/docs/service-asset-manager/sap-service-and-asset-manager-configuration-guide/features-and-personas-configuration-matrix?locale=en-US

Have you encountered this requirement in previous projects?

Your insights would be greatly appreciated.

Kind regards,

SAP Service and Asset Manager PLM Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)/Plant Maintenance (PM) SAP S/4HANA Cloud Private Edition

entry.title: Configuration steps to deactivate MRS
entry.content:
Hi Team,

Can you please let me know the configuration steps to deactivate MRS for work orders. When we try to assign a personnel number and save it we get message No Resource is available. Is there any configuration to deactivate it?

Regards,

Jaya

entry.title: Maintenance Order - MACM not updating to MSPT even if no materials are arriving on required date
entry.content:
Hello Gurus,

I hope you can help me with my query. We have a background job to run /MRSS/MAT_AVAILABILITY_CHECK everyday to ensure timely and correct status of the Maintenance Orders. Can someone please explain what are considered to update a MACM status to MSPT?

We have an example wherein the Requirement Date in the MO is at 26.12.2025. The PDT of the materials in the MO are both 10 days. GR processing and PO processing time is 1 day for each. If the background job runs at 16.12.2025, should the MO be updated to MSPT since the projected time the materials will be available will be on 29.12.2025? I simulated this scenario but the MO remained MACM instead of MSPT. 

Please help me to understand ATP more. Thank you so much for sharing your knowledge!

entry.title: Settlement of Refurbishment Cost to Asset
entry.content:
Hi All , 

I am aware that in standard SAP , refurbishment cost is settled to  material . However , my business wants to settle the cost to the corresponding asset . Can any one please throw some light how can we address this requirement ?

Thanking you in advance .

Best Regards 

Mohammed

entry.title: Date Issue within a Work Order Earliest & Latest finish dates
entry.content: We have a work order with a basic finish date of 31.12.2025.  Two of the operations where planned in for work to be completed on the 4th & 5th of October and both operations where confirmed as completed on the 18th November 2025.  But for some reason they are showing a earliest finish date & latest finish date of 01.01.2026.  I have checked all the other operations and they are either 31.12.2025 or a date before.  Can some please advise why this would be happening.

entry.title: Clarification Required: Single Maintenance Plan Covering HRS & Time-Based Strategy
entry.content:
Description / Issue:
We are implementing preventive maintenance for fleet equipment (Tippers) using Multiple Counter Maintenance Plans (Running Hours and Time-based).

Business Requirement:
When a maintenance order is generated from a maintenance plan, only the operations relevant to the due cycle should appear in the order.

  • Example:

    • If the 1000 running hours cycle becomes due, only Engine Oil and related filter activities should appear.

    • If the 365-day time-based cycle becomes due, only time-based maintenance operations should appear.

Non-due activities should not be included in the maintenance order.

DescriptionHRSDays
ENGINE OIL 15W40 CI4+ VOLVOLINE (1000)1000365
SPIN OIL FILTER F7A01500 (1000)1000650
FUEL WATER SEPARTOR PHJ00004 (1000)1000365
PRE FILTER FHJ01000 (1000)1000450
AIR FILTER KIT P5104005 (1000)1000720
AXLE OIL 85W140 VALVOLINE (2000)2000720
HUB GREASING (2000)2000720
GEAR OIL EP80W90 VOLVOLINE (3000)3000720
STEERING OIL CHANGE GEAR BOX (5000)5000720
CLUTH FLUID OIL CHANGE (5000)5000365
COOLANT (5000)5000365
TIPPING CYLINDER HYD OIL (5000)5000720

entry.title: Default Public Layout in Fiori App
entry.content:
Hi All, 

I need to prepare some view/layout  in fiori app such as "Find maintenance Order " app . Even though I am setting "Public " checkbox,   still system is not defaulting this specific lay out for all users . User need to select the layout manually . My requirement is that IT team will set one public layout & same should be defaulted to all users . If users need different layout they can prepare their own layout .

entry.title: Measuring Points based on the maintenance strategy
entry.content:
We are using Dynamic forms for all the tasks and they want to record measuring points via the dynamic forms. For the same technical object, we have multiple measuring points, for example weekly 3 MP's, for monthly 4 MP's and for Yearly 3 MP's,  Now, the requirement from the client is,  they want only the relevant measuring point to be populated on the form and not all the measuring pointers/ counters relevant to the technical object on the form.

I understand we can try this using PRT's to split the measuring points in Fiori or GUI, but can we achieve this using Dynamic forms? Please suggest.

entry.title: Requirement for OR-based Multiple Maintenance Interval Plan in SAP PM
entry.content:
Dear SAP  Team,

We have a requirement to configure multiple maintenance activities for the same equipment with different HR-based and time-based intervals, where the maintenance order should be generated based on whichever condition is met first (OR logic).

Maintenance details are as follows:

  1. Engine Service – 1000 HR OR 12 Months

  2. Regular Check – 500 HR OR 6 Months

  3. Filter Change – 250 HR OR 3 Months

  4. Oil Change – 350 HR OR 4 Months

  5. Grease – 500 HR OR 6 Months

Request you to please configure a Strategy-Based Maintenance Plan in SAP PM using standard functionality so that:

  • Multiple packages are maintained under a maintenance strategy

  • Orders are generated automatically based on the first due condition (HR or Time)

  • No custom development is required

Please confirm the configuration approach and timelines.

entry.title: Resetting Total Counter Reading
entry.content:
Hi Ali, 

How can we reset total counter reading to zero ? After overhauling of engine, users want to start total counter reading from zero. I have suggested to use Replace counter functionality or set counter reading value externally functionality but this function is not resetting total counter reading field value as zero . Can anyone please through some light on this . 

Thanking you .

Mohammed

entry.title: How to add version, AFKO_KAPVERSA, field to W0017
entry.content:
We would like to add the Version, AFKO_KAPVERSA, fields to W0017.

We managed to add other fields to W0017, but the version field is not available in the repository of fields that can be added as an UIBB element. How can we extend the repository to the field.

The KBA 3395716 is about deleting a field, not to add one. Further reference was EAM Web UI Implementation Guide - Adapting EAM Web UI.

Is it possible to give a bit more information because we didn't manage to get a lot further.
